forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 58F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
